name: Puentes De Salud
description:
Puentes de Salud (Bridges of Health) is a 501(c)3 nonprofit organization that promotes the health and wellness of Philadelphia’s rapidly growing Latino immigrant population through high-quality health care, innovative educational programs, and community building.

Students can volunteer in either the clinic or educational programming, and there are also opportunities for internships and fellowships.

http://www.puentesdesalud.org/
